page.title: 13Vicky's Collections
page.content: I have several strange collections. I collect cardboard-the sort of card- board you find in toothpaste boxes, mini-cereal boxes and photo-film boxes. I also collect photos of famous people from magazines. Other people I know collect things like beer mats, foreign coins,stamps,teeth,posters, rubbers,postcards,stickers and different types of stationery. Stamp collecting is a very popular hobby throughout the world. Some old stamps like 'penny blacks' are very rare and valuable but you can have fun collecting ordinary stamps particular- ly if you have a pen-pal in another country you can swop stamps with Animals are also very popular with collectors. Claire collects cats-cat ornaments,cat pictures,and any object either with a cat on it or in the shape of a cat.
